Text: Gilbert Foliot:  During his tenure as abbot he acquired additional land for the abbey, and may have helped to fabricate some charters—legal deeds attesting property ownership—to gain advantage in a dispute with the Archbishops of York.
Triplets:<Gilbert Foliot
5:
--------------------
<Text: Gilbert Foliot:  Although Foliot recognised Stephen as the King of England, he may have also sympathised with the Empress Matilda's claim to the throne.>
Triplets:<Gilbert Foliot
